title: Learning Trajectory-Based Exploration of the Mean Value Concept

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Data Representation Methods in Tables and Graphs
context.additional_context: Lesson design including supplementary learning activities using smart devices in limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Students can explain the principles of mean calculation by analyzing various data representations (tables, graphs)
Learners can categorize the meaning and scope of application of averages by situational context through real-life examples
Develop the ability to identify and correct errors in the process of deriving mean values through collaborative learning activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
